programme.title: Passionate Love
programme.desc: Dong-woo and Yoon-seo, both heartbroken, cross paths and slowly realize they can start anew.

programme.title: 4:44 : Time Of Fear
programme.desc: Missing persons. Eerie sounds. Shadows at night. Bukchon Apartment hides more than secrets.

programme.title: Citizen of A Kind
programme.desc: After losing her fortune in a scam, Duk-hee sets out to rescue the scammer in China to reclaim her lost money.

programme.title: Man on the Edge
programme.desc: Strange things begin to happen to Kwang-ho, a famous mob, after he is stabbed in the hand during a fight.

programme.title: One Day
programme.desc: Kang-soo, an insurance investigator, has lost all the hope and purpose of living after his wife died. One day, the company gives him the case of Mi-so, a girl who’s fallen into a coma from a car accident. At the hospital he goes to investigate the case, he meets a girl who claims that she is Mi-so, who in reality can’t walk or talk. Kang-soo eventually comes to accept that for some reason only he can see the spirit of Mi-so. And Mi-so asks Kang-soo to help her biggest wish come true before she has to leave this world for good.

programme.title: Heung-Boo: The Revolutionist
programme.desc: In Joseon, a satirical play by Heung-boo gains fame, drawing attention from both rulers and rebels.

programme.title: The Vanished
programme.desc: The body of Jin-han's wife whom Jin-han secretly murdered suddenly disappears. The mystery and the suspense surrounding the disappearance grows bigger and bigger.

programme.title: Cheer Up, Mr. Lee
programme.desc: Cheol-Soo, an attractive and well-built man with intellectual disabilities, sets out on a trip with the daughter he never knew he had.

programme.title: My Wife is a Gangster 3 : HK Edition
programme.desc: A Mafia boss's daughter is wrongly accused of murder and sent to Korea, where an assassin is sent to kill her.

programme.title: Pain
programme.desc: A love story between a man who cannot sense anything and a woman with hemophilia.

programme.title: Lost Flower: Eo Woo-dong
programme.desc: Betrayed by her husband, Hye-in seeks revenge, becomes Eo Woo Dong, and sparks a scandal that rattles Joseon.

programme.title: Granny's Got Talent
programme.desc: Korea's biggest cursing tournament begins! Among contesters like a diss rapper and grumpy police, a legendary granny shows who the real potty mouth is.

programme.title: Toxic Desire: Addiction
programme.desc: A psychiatrist with a painful past, haunted by his wife's suicide after rape, enters a deadly relationship.
